description: Kamikurata Naoyuki is the father of http://anidb.net/ch5895 [Kamikurata Kyouta]. He runs a convenience store together with his wife http://anidb.net/ch40621 [Keiko]. Kyouto frequently helps out in the store and has the option of permanently working there in case his musical career won`t work out.
name: Kamikurata Naoyuki
